question.title: How to use spring web client to load class fields from HAL format response
question.body:
I want to use spring web client of any other client to read HAL format responses and set class fields properly.please find my scenario below API to get person information : http://localhost:8080/person/101 response:

{
"id": 101,
"name": "some name",
"_links": {
    "self": {
        "href":"http://localhost:8080/person/101"
    },
    "addresses": {
        "href": "http://localhost:8080/person/101/addresses"
    }   
}

now when I call above api to get the person, the web client should also call "http://localhost:8080/person/101/addresses and set the person's addresses

The response from API http://localhost:8080/person/101/addresses as below

{
"_embaded": {
    "addresses": [
        {
            "house": "L4022",
            "street": "street 1",
            "city":"city 1",
            "country": "country 1",
            "pincode": "123456"         
        },
        {
            "house": "M694",
            "street": "street 2",
            "city":"city 2",
            "country": "country 1",
            "pincode": "234567"         
        }
    ]
}

}

answers.body:
Look at the Traverson client in spring hateoas project.

Traverson traverson = new Traverson(URI.create("http://localhost:8080/person/101"), MediaTypes.HAL_JSON);

CollectionModelType<Address> collectionModelType =
    TypeReferences.CollectionModelType<Address>() {};

CollectionModel<Address> addresses = traverson.//
    follow(rel("addresses")).//
    toObject(collectionModelType);
